inventoryItem.Name: Full Restore
inventoryItem.Description: Fully Recovers HP and Status Conditions

inventoryItem.Name: Max Revive
inventoryItem.Description: Restores a Fainted Pokémon to it's Max HP

inventoryItem.Name: Revive
inventoryItem.Description: Restores a Fainted Pokémon to 1/2 of it's Max HP

inventoryItem.Name: Max Ether
inventoryItem.Description: Recovers all PP for a Move

inventoryItem.Name: Max Elixer
inventoryItem.Description: Recovers all PP for all Moves

inventoryItem.Name: Pokéball
inventoryItem.Description: Normal Chance of Catching a Pokémon

inventoryItem.Name: Great Ball
inventoryItem.Description: 1.5x Chance of Catching a Pokémon than using a standard Pokéball

inventoryItem.Name: Ultra Ball
inventoryItem.Description: 2x Chance of Catching a Pokémon than using a standard Pokéball

inventoryItem.Name: Premium Ball
inventoryItem.Description: Normal Chance of Catching a Pokémon

inventoryItem.Name: Dive Ball
inventoryItem.Description: If underwater, a 3.5 times chance of catching a Pokémon otherwise its a Normal Chance of Catching a Pokémon

inventoryItem.Name: Luxury Ball
inventoryItem.Description: Normal Chance of Catching a Pokémon, makes it easier for the Pokémon to like you

inventoryItem.Name: Nest Ball
inventoryItem.Description: The Lower the Pokémon's Level, the Higher chance of capture

inventoryItem.Name: Net Ball
inventoryItem.Description: Normal Chance of Catching a Pokémon unless it's a Bug or Water type in which it's a 3x normal chance

inventoryItem.Name: Repeat Ball
inventoryItem.Description: A 3 times chance of capturing Pokémon if you already have one of the same breed, otherwise it's a Normal Chance of Catching a Pokémon

inventoryItem.Name: Safari Ball
inventoryItem.Description: 1.5x Chance of Catching a Pokémon. Safari Zone Only

inventoryItem.Name: Timer Ball
inventoryItem.Description: For Every Ten Turns in battle, the chance of catching the Pokémon rises

inventoryItem.Description: Any Fighting Type Move's Power is increased by 10%

inventoryItem.Name: BlackGlasses
inventoryItem.Description: Any Dark Type Move's Power is increased by 10%

inventoryItem.Description: When Attached, Raises Beauty Stat in Contests

inventoryItem.Name: Charcoal
inventoryItem.Description: Any Fire Type Move's Power is increased by 10%

inventoryItem.Name: Choice Band
inventoryItem.Description: Multiplies 1st Move Power by 1.5 if Physical

inventoryItem.Name: DeepSeaScale
inventoryItem.Description: Clamperl's Special Defense increases by 100%. Evolves Clamperl to Gorebyss

inventoryItem.Name: DeepSeaTooth
inventoryItem.Description: Clamperl's Special Attack increases by 100%. Evolves Clamperl to Huntail

inventoryItem.Name: Dragon Fang
inventoryItem.Description: Any Dragon Type Move's Power is increased by 10%

inventoryItem.Name: Dragon Scale
inventoryItem.Description: A Scale held by Dragon Types. Evolves Seadra into Kingdra when traded

inventoryItem.Name: Exp. Share
inventoryItem.Description: This Pokémon gets EXP from battle even if it isnt used

inventoryItem.Name: Macho Brace
